column1: The Purple Pig////roasted bone marrow- aw so underwhelmed. i was really excited to try this. but it didnt taste what i thought bone marrow would taste. i like the cilantro pieces to use to garnish
column2: i think the cilantro made the bone marrow instead of being just a garnish. it came with a small bowl of salt
column3: but with all the other salty dishes
column4: i didnt need to add any!
